name: flux
description: Flux is a simple, lightweight package manager for managing dependencies in your project, allowing easy installation of npm packages.

scripts.build: ps2exe -inputFile install_flux.ps1 -outputFile install_flux.exe -title "Flux" -description "custom package manager" -requireAdmin -product "Flux Installer" -company "Gautam Inc." -version "1.0.0"

author: Gautam Suthar <iamgautamsuthar@outlook.com> (https://github.com/callmegautam)
